snippet: Carmelo Anthony scored 23 points to help the Knicks, who struggled on defense and with 3-pointers, pull out a 98-95 win.
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony scored 23 points to help the Knicks, who struggled on defense and with 3-pointers, pull out a 98-95 win.

headline.seo: Despite Struggles on Defense, Knicks Edge Celtics in Overtime
headline.main: Knicks Edge Celtics Despite Struggles With 3-Pointers and Defense
headline.print_headline: Knicks Edge Celtics Despite Struggles With 3-pointers and Defense
